item.title: Announcing Writings
item.description: Hey! Welcome to my website. I’ve decided to add a writing section with the intent of sharing medium-to-long-form essays on the topics listed on the Writings page. My first article is on a ubiquitous method that’s super useful for solving challenging programming Leetcode-style problems that I haven’t seen described elsewhere yet– stay tuned! In the meantime, enjoy this riddle while it lasts (I’m deleting this post once my first article comes out!
